long_description: This comprehensive volume covers 400 runs in Colorado, New Mexico, Arizona, Utah and Wyoming. Authors: Kyle McCutchen and Evan Stafford. Softcover; 635 pages; color photos and maps. Wolverine Publishing LLC; copyright 2007. Color-coded sections by region make river reference easy. Concise river descriptions, full-color photos, put-in directions and pertinent chart statistics get you ready to paddle.
short_description: This comprehensive volume covers 400 runs in Colorado, New Mexico, Arizona, Utah and Wyoming.
